name: NinjaSexPartyTWRP Starlight Flappy Light
description: I decided to create a simple videogame to tribute a song from one of my favourite group band crossover TWRP feat Ninja Sex Party, "Starlight Brigade". In a style of Flappy Bird we need to avoid enemies structures and enemies in order to fight the beings that suck out out the light and hope from the galaxy. Even when the taks may seem imposible, with the power of your friends you might be able to succeed.
